definition: (bird species of China) northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis)

sentences.english: Goshawk circled in the mountains on the river surging with the cliffs.
sentences.chinese: 蒼鷹在山巒上盤旋，江水隨着絕壁激盪。

sentences.english: The blue sky above, goshawk action is ongoing.
sentences.chinese: 蔚藍的天際之上，“蒼鷹”行動正在進行之中。

sentences.english: Living in Lesser Khingan Mountains, Accipiter gentiles and Strix nebulosa share the same habit of reusing their old nests.
sentences.chinese: 在小興安嶺繁殖的蒼鷹和烏林鴞都有利用舊巢的習慣。

sentences.english: Attila the Hun decorated his battle helmet with the figure of one. —Mel White
sentences.chinese: 匈奴王阿提拉就以一隻蒼鷹形像裝飾他戰鬥的頭盔。

sentences.english: As sparrows eagles, or the hare the lion.
sentences.chinese: 像麻雀嚇蒼鷹，草兔嚇獅子一般。

definition: luan and phoenix/husband and wife/virtuous person/sovereign/belle
to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
male eagle/tercel (male falcon used in falconry)
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
lit. ten thousand stampeding horses (idiom)/fig. with great momentum/going full speed ahead
to fly up/to dance in the air (of snowflakes, flower petals etc)
